Create a virtual reality experience where the user can time travel and interact with the Time-Traveling Bunny in different eras.
Develop a mobile app that generates random adventures and challenges for the Time-Traveling Bunny to complete each day, keeping the user engaged and entertained.
Create a social media campaign where the Time-Traveling Bunny interacts with different historical figures and events, and the user can follow along and participate in the journey.
Design a board game where players take on the role of the Time-Traveling Bunny, completing challenges and making their way through different eras to reach the end.
Develop an augmented reality game where the user can see the Time-Traveling Bunny in their own world and interact with them to complete challenges and earn rewards.
